languages.text: "Ну..." {n}— мальчик смотрит на вас во все глаза.{/n} "Мама велела чтить Импелатола и всегда говолить правду. Но я не сказал, что это я сломал двель у лесенки. Я стлусил. И все лугали длугого мальчика. Потом был стласный день... мне сказали что мама больше не жива и ее душа улетела к Импелатолу... Что если он плогонит ее потому что я такой стласный тлус и влун?" {n} — заканчивает он почти шепотом.{/n}

"Well..." {n}The little boy stares at you.{/n} "Mummy awways towd me to honour the Empewor and awways tell the twuth. But I didn't say it was me who bwoke the door by the wadder. I got scared. And evewyone bwamed another boy. Then, on the scawy day... they said Mummy wasn't awive anymore and her soul had gone to the Empewor. What if he turns her away because I'm such a cowawd and a wiar?" {n}He almost whispers the final words.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Ну..." {n}— мальчик смотрит на вас во все глаза.{/n} "Мама велела чтить Импелатола и всегда говолить правду. Но я не сказал, что это я сломал двель у лесенки. Я стлусил. И все лугали длугого мальчика. Потом был стласный день... мне сказали что мама больше не жива и ее душа улетела к Импелатолу... Что если он плогонит ее потому что я такой стласный тлус и влун?" {n} — заканчивает он почти шепотом.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Well..." {n}The little boy stares at you.{/n} "Mommy awways towd me to honor the Empewor and awways tell the twuth. But I didn't say it was me who bwoke the door by the wadder. I got scared. And evewyone bwamed another boy. Then, on the scawy day... they said Mommy wasn't awive anymore and her soul had gone to the Empewor. What if he tuwns her away because I'm such a cowawd and a liar?" {n}He almost whispers the final words.{/n}

And evewyone bwamed another boy. Then, on the scawy day... they said Mummy wasn't awive anymore and her soul had gone to the Empewor. What if he turns her away because I'm such a cowawd and a wiar?" {n}He almost whispers the final words.{/n}

languages.text: “嗯……”{n}小男孩盯着你。{/n}“妈妈总说要尊重地黄，说要当个成实的人。当时是我弄坏了梯子旁边的门，可我吓坏了，没有高苏他们，他们都以为是别人弄坏的。后来，可怕的事情发生了……他们说，妈妈已经不在了，说她的灵浑已经去了地黄那里。可万一地黄因为我是个胆小鬼，还撒了谎，不愿意接受妈妈的灵浑，那该怎么办？”{n}他几乎是嗫嚅着，说出了最后那句话。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Well..." {n}The little boy stares at you.{/n} "Mummy awways towd me to honour the Empewor and awways tell the twuth. But I didn't say it was me who bwoke the door by the wadder. I got scared. And evewyone bwamed another boy. Then, on the scawy day... they said Mummy wasn't awive anymore and her soul had gone to the Empewor. What if he turns her away because I'm such a cowawd and a wiar?" {n}He almost whispers the final words.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “嗯……”{n}小男孩盯着你。{/n}“妈妈总说要尊重地黄，说要当个成实的人。当时是我弄坏了梯子旁边的门，可我吓坏了，没有高苏他们，他们都以为是别人弄坏的。后来，可怕的事情发生了……他们说，妈妈已经不在了，说她的灵浑已经去了地黄那里。可万一地黄因为我是个胆小鬼，还撒了谎，不愿意接受妈妈的灵浑，那该怎么办？”{n}他几乎是嗫嚅着，说出了最后那句话。{/n}

languages.text: «Bueno...» {n}El niño te mira.{/n} «Mamá siempre dijo que honrara al Emperador y dijera la verdad. Pero no dije que fui yo el que rompió la puerta junto a la escalera. Me dio miedo. Y le echaron la culpa a otro. Y ese día que dio tanto miedo... dijeron que mamá ya no estaba viva y su alma había ido al Emperador. ¿Y si la rechaza porque soy un cobarde y un mentiroso?». {n}Apenas susurra estas últimas palabras.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Well..." {n}The little boy stares at you.{/n} "Mummy awways towd me to honour the Empewor and awways tell the twuth. But I didn't say it was me who bwoke the door by the wadder. I got scared. And evewyone bwamed another boy. Then, on the scawy day... they said Mummy wasn't awive anymore and her soul had gone to the Empewor. What if he turns her away because I'm such a cowawd and a wiar?" {n}He almost whispers the final words.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Bueno...» {n}El niño te mira.{/n} «Mamá siempre dijo que honrara al Emperador y dijera la verdad. Pero no dije que fui yo el que rompió la puerta junto a la escalera. Me dio miedo. Y le echaron la culpa a otro. Y ese día que dio tanto miedo... dijeron que mamá ya no estaba viva y su alma había ido al Emperador. ¿Y si la rechaza porque soy un cobarde y un mentiroso?». {n}Apenas susurra estas últimas palabras.{/n}

languages.text: 「でも…」{n}少年はあなたを見つめる。{/n}「ママはいつも僕に、コウテイを敬うように、そしていつも本当のことを言うようにって言ったんだ。でも、ハシゴでドアを壊したのが僕だとは言わなかったんだ。僕は怖くなったんだ。みんなが他の子を非難してたから。そして、あの恐ろしい日…ママはもう生きていなくて、魂はコウテイのところに行ってしまったっていわれた。もし僕がこんな怖がりだからって、ママが追い出されたらどうしよう？{n}最後の言葉は、ほとんど消え入りそうなほどだった。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Well..." {n}The little boy stares at you.{/n} "Mummy awways towd me to honour the Empewor and awways tell the twuth. But I didn't say it was me who bwoke the door by the wadder. I got scared. And evewyone bwamed another boy. Then, on the scawy day... they said Mummy wasn't awive anymore and her soul had gone to the Empewor. What if he turns her away because I'm such a cowawd and a wiar?" {n}He almost whispers the final words.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「でも…」{n}少年はあなたを見つめる。{/n}「ママはいつも僕に、コウテイを敬うように、そしていつも本当のことを言うようにって言ったんだ。でも、ハシゴでドアを壊したのが僕だとは言わなかったんだ。僕は怖くなったんだ。みんなが他の子を非難してたから。そして、あの恐ろしい日…ママはもう生きていなくて、魂はコウテイのところに行ってしまったっていわれた。もし僕がこんな怖がりだからって、ママが追い出されたらどうしよう？{n}最後の言葉は、ほとんど消え入りそうなほどだった。{/n}

languages.text: "Nun ..." {n}Der kleine Junge starrt dich an.{/n} "Mami sagt, ich muss den Imperator ehren und immer die Wahrheit sagen. Aber ich hab nicht gesagt, dass ich die Tür bei der Leiter kaputt gemacht hab. Ich hatte Angst. Und alle gaben einem anderen Jungen die Schuld. Dann, an dem schlimmen Tag ... sie sagten, Mami lebt nicht mehr, und ihre Seele ist jetzt beim Imperator. Was ist, wenn er sie wegschickt, weil ich ein Feigling und Lügner bin?" {n}Die letzten Worte flüstert er beinahe.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Well..." {n}The little boy stares at you.{/n} "Mummy awways towd me to honour the Empewor and awways tell the twuth. But I didn't say it was me who bwoke the door by the wadder. I got scared. And evewyone bwamed another boy. Then, on the scawy day... they said Mummy wasn't awive anymore and her soul had gone to the Empewor. What if he turns her away because I'm such a cowawd and a wiar?" {n}He almost whispers the final words.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Nun ..." {n}Der kleine Junge starrt dich an.{/n} "Mami sagt, ich muss den Imperator ehren und immer die Wahrheit sagen. Aber ich hab nicht gesagt, dass ich die Tür bei der Leiter kaputt gemacht hab. Ich hatte Angst. Und alle gaben einem anderen Jungen die Schuld. Dann, an dem schlimmen Tag ... sie sagten, Mami lebt nicht mehr, und ihre Seele ist jetzt beim Imperator. Was ist, wenn er sie wegschickt, weil ich ein Feigling und Lügner bin?" {n}Die letzten Worte flüstert er beinahe.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le petit garçon vous fixe du regard.{/n} « Hum... Maman, elle disait toujours qu'on doit faire honneur à l'Empereur et qu'on doit dire la vérité. Mais j'ai pas dit que c'est moi qui ai cassé la porte à côté de l'échelle. J'ai eu peur. Et puis tout le monde a accusé un autre garçon. Après, le jour où les méchants sont venus... quelqu'un m'a dit que maman était plus là et que son âme était partie voir l'Empereur. Mais... et s'il voulait pas d'elle parce que je suis un lâche et un menteur ? » {n}Ses derniers mots sont à peine plus audibles qu'un murmure.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Well..." {n}The little boy stares at you.{/n} "Mummy awways towd me to honour the Empewor and awways tell the twuth. But I didn't say it was me who bwoke the door by the wadder. I got scared. And evewyone bwamed another boy. Then, on the scawy day... they said Mummy wasn't awive anymore and her soul had gone to the Empewor. What if he turns her away because I'm such a cowawd and a wiar?" {n}He almost whispers the final words.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le petit garçon vous fixe du regard.{/n} « Hum... Maman, elle disait toujours qu'on doit faire honneur à l'Empereur et qu'on doit dire la vérité. Mais j'ai pas dit que c'est moi qui ai cassé la porte à côté de l'échelle. J'ai eu peur. Et puis tout le monde a accusé un autre garçon. Après, le jour où les méchants sont venus... quelqu'un m'a dit que maman était plus là et que son âme était partie voir l'Empereur. Mais... et s'il voulait pas d'elle parce que je suis un lâche et un menteur ? » {n}Ses derniers mots sont à peine plus audibles qu'un murmure.{/n}

languages.text: "Şey..." {n}Küçük oğlan, gözünü bile kırpmadan sana bakıyor.{/n} "Annecim bana İmpayatoy'u onuylandıy ve doğyuyu söyle dedi. Yine de meydiveni kıydığımı söylemedim. Çok koyktum çünkü. Heykes diğey çocuğa kızdı. Soyna... O koykunç günde... Annecin öldü dediley bana. Yuhu aytık İmpayatoy'un yanındaymış. Ya İmpayatoy anneme kızaysa... Ya yuhunu cezalandıyıysa? Ben koykak ve yalançı olduğum için hem de..." {n}Cümle sonuna doğru kelimeleri fısıltıya dönüşüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Well..." {n}The little boy stares at you.{/n} "Mummy awways towd me to honour the Empewor and awways tell the twuth. But I didn't say it was me who bwoke the door by the wadder. I got scared. And evewyone bwamed another boy. Then, on the scawy day... they said Mummy wasn't awive anymore and her soul had gone to the Empewor. What if he turns her away because I'm such a cowawd and a wiar?" {n}He almost whispers the final words.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Şey…" {n}Küçük oğlan, gözünü bile kırpmadan sana bakıyor.{/n} "Annecim bana İmpayatoy'u onuylandıy ve doğyuyu söyle dedi. Yine de meydiveni kıydığımı söylemedim. Çok koyktum çünkü. Heykes diğey çocuğa kızdı. Soyna… O koykunç günde… Annecin öldü dediley bana. Yuhu aytık İmpayatoy'un yanındaymış. Ya İmpayatoy anneme kızaysa… Ya yuhunu cezalandıyıysa? Ben koykak ve yalançı olduğum için hem de…" {n}Cümle sonuna doğru kelimeleri fısıltıya dönüşüyor.{/n}
